name: 黃馨瑩
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。

scorePolicy:
1. Daily Performance: 25%
(a) Check-in Quiz and assignments- 10%
(b) Vocabulary Review Test- 5%
(c) Your attendance and participation - 10%
2. Course Projects: 24%
3. Remedial classes (輔導課程成績): 21%
(a) Attendance and Participation- 6%
(b) Weekly Test- 15%
4. Campus-wide Proficiency Test: 30% (期中&期末會考各15%)
materials:
